Fun Facts About Ice Cream

Ice cream was brought to Continental Europe by Marco Polo from his travels in China in the late 13th century

The ice cream cone was simultaneously introduced in 1904 at a New York City ice cream shop and at the St. Louis World's Fair

The first ever ice cream truck was driven by an Ohio man named Harry Burt in 1920

Listen Carefully! We are a group of individuals that represent a small foreign faction. We respect your business, but not the country it serves. At this time, we have your daughter in our possession. She is safe and unharmed and if you want her to see 1997, you must follow our instructions to the letter.

You will withdraw $118,000 from your account. $100,000 will be in $100 bills and the remaining $18,000 in $20 bills. Make sure that you bring an adequate size attache to the bank. When you get home, you will put the money in a brown paper bag. I will call you between 8 and 10 a.m. tomorrow to instruct you on delivery. The delivery will be exhausting so I advise you to be rested.
